definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Jinwozi Gold Deposit lies in the mid ore-forming band of Beishan Belt, Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 金窩子金礦牀爲於甘肅北山中成礦帶。

sentences.english: It is spatially and originally related to the granite.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀在空間上和成因上與金窩子花崗岩關係密切。
